reviews.review: Los mejores 20 pesos que te vas a gastar en la vida, juegazo total
What a amazing game. You should also try the co-op mode with a friend it is great fun!! :3

What can I say, the game is excellent with a good storyline!
Advantages of the game:
+ Plot
+ Gameplay
+ Co-op
Cons of the game:
-There are bugs
That's all 7/10 game!
One of the best games i have ever played and a must for anyone calling themselves gamers
Klasyk. Bardzo wciągająca logiczna gra z niezapomnianą fabuła. Polecam przejść minimum 2 razy. Raz samemu i raz w coopie ;)
Lots of fun to play. Great sequel
Z A J E B I S T A gra!!!!!
One of the best games ever made
Recomendadisimo, viejo pero no le pesa nada la edad, ademas de los mapas de la comunidad y su modo cooperativo que hace que nunca acabe la experiencia de juego.
Es elmejor juego para tontear con un amigo el final increible y mucho más...
素晴らしいの一言です
Sehr gutes Spiel macht Spaß und ist interessant
挺有意思的，就是玩得我有点晕
Jogo legal pra caramba,ainda mais jogando com um amigoo.nhe
Pretty fun playing with friends. best played with volume low

Game's really good

like *really* good

but you don't need to be told that
Best puzzle game to ever have come out

[h1]ТОП ИГРА[/h1]
Первая часть портала конечно хороша, но эта на порядок лучше.

Плюсы:
1. Графика
2. Топовый сюжет
3. Много ачивок
4. Кооператив

Минусы:
1. Песня в конце игры хуже, чем в первой части
2. [b]Осторожно - спойлер[/b] [spoiler]Сюжет заставляет убивать (почти) друзей :([/spoiler]

Игра обязательна к покупке.
Mi juego de puzzles favorito, y cada día el de más gente... o algo.
One of the best games ever made..for a dollar this is the best deal out there. GET IT NOW IF YOU DON'T HAVE IT

The Portal games are both absolute masterpieces. In my opinion, they're some of the best games of all time for sure. 

Portal 2 expands on the first game a lot. The single player mode offers plenty of content (replayed these games a [i]few[/i] times, to be honest) and there's even an online multiplayer mode.
(I actually hadn't played the co-op mode since around the time when I first got the game, so I took the time to play that again too, recently.)

These games have really engaging gameplay, that also makes you think a little. Quirky characters... Great stories (though I feel like the second game has more of a story, and of course, it's longer too)... They're incredibly fun games that everyone here on Steam should at least give a chance. 
I mean, [i]Valve[/i] made these games... And well, the amount of positive feedback these games have received probably speaks for itself, in a way.

[i]And[/i] with the summer sale going on, honestly, if you don't have these games...you should probably [b]at least[/b] get the portal bundle right now, while it's still going on. It's pretty dang cheap. xD
너무 너무 재미 있음 솔로도 재미 있고 듀오도 재미 있고

Nice puzzle game! Does toy around with your mind quite a bit, and GLaDOS is a nice addition to all of this. Her humor fits in, and the story of the game is basically based around her. Recommend definetly!
Very good and fun, apocalyptic puzzles!

Portal 2 é um jogo com puzzles muito bons, alguns "impossíveis", outros q eu consegui passar na cagada pois acabei fazendo uma coisa q não queria e no fim era realmente aquilo q precisava ser feito.

Cabei de zerar saporra, quase tive um infarto no final, mas deu tudo certo.
Really good game with great puzzles, story and multiplayer. I'd recommend to friends that don't have it yet since it's extra cheap during summer sale.
Juego muy entretenido y que te hace pensar. Muy recomendable
Игра с самой лучшей локализацией в мире

I got Portal 2 from the steam summer sale for $1.14 , It was worth every penny. The rich story and characters along with the unique weapons and items made this game an experience I will never forget. 

I recommend this game a lot (Especially for 1 dollar.).

Это шедевр.
всё что сделано в игре просто изумительно.
советую всем, даже не любителем головоломок.
This game works beautifully, the story is capturing, and the game is motivating.

Увлекательная головоломка с сюжетом, хорошей графикой и весёлыми диалогами. После прохождения можно пойти с другом в весёлый кооперативный режим. А если стандартные камеры испытаний вам надоели, есть workshop и даже базовый конструктор камер испытаний. После прохождения вы ещё долго будете напевать Want You Gone. Тут весело.
Un juego muy completo, además de un buen modo cooperativo

Nice humor, nice gameplay. You will feel friendly with GLaDOS and get to know her past. There are some mind boggling puzzles. I had to watch some walkthrough videos to pass a couple of levels. But maybe i am just too bad xd. i didn't need that for first game though. So it is definitely more difficult than the first one. But it also offers more levels and more hours of gameplay. So, like the majority of gamers, will probably like it more than the first game.

(Main story takes about 9 hours and with extras it takes around 14 hours.)

There is almost nothing that i don't like about Portal games. I definitely recommend it. Action, sadness, comedy, puzzles... it has everything. You will have great joy
无愧神作之名，和朋友一起玩简直爽爆
脑洞真大，很有创意，难度适中，偶尔卡关，优秀的双人游戏
Збс игра, особенно если попадается умный напарник
Its really fucking good. Play it.

Очень неожиданные повороты сюжета и потрясающая озвучка. Рекомендую.

前作と比べてパズルのボリュームは増やしつつも理不尽な仕掛けは排除されており、前作以上に楽しめます。
ストーリーは前作とがっつり繋がっているので、前作プレイ後に本作をプレイすることを強くお勧めします。

单机合作都特别好玩，尤其是合作，就是朋友少合作的机会很少。
当时我在ps3的时候我就玩过，是在英国看到买到的，没记错好像也有个几十英镑，相当贵，但是现在在电脑3块人民币买到了，合作模式可以匹配也是相当好，就是语音是不是我这边的问题不知道就是接收不是很好。
创意工坊应该是pc最有意思的，很多很厉害的人制作的图也相当有趣。
结果来说就算是原价37块买也不会亏，相当赚，虽然基于你喜欢玩解密类，我玩过所以相当简单，但是如果你没玩过可能会很烦恼，所以建议没耐心的人慎重

a historinha é bue de fixe
